description: 5.41 (L1) Ensure 'Xbox Live Networking Service (XboxNetApiSvc)' is set to 'Disabled'
info:
This service supports the Windows.Networking.XboxLive application programming interface.

The recommended state for this setting is: Disabled

Xbox Live is a gaming service and has no place in an enterprise managed environment (perhaps unless it is a gaming company).
solution:
"To establish the recommended configuration, run the following PowerShell command:

Set-Service -Name XboxNetApiSvc -StartupType Disabled
Impact: Connections to Xbox Live may fail and applications that interact with that service may also fail."
